REQUIREMENTS VERSION 1  


1.FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS


1.1 SERVICE EXCHANGE

1.1.1. Services should be offered and requested by system users.
 
1.1.2 Demanded services should be served by system users.

1.1.2.1. Services should be able to exchange between system users.

1.1.2.2. Service providers should gain social credits.

1.1.3. Services shall be searchable and browsable by system users.
 
1.1.4. Service providers and receptors shall be rated.


1.2 USERS

1.2.1 Registration

1.2.1.1 System shall demand name, surname, e-mail, phone number, location from the new member at the registration time.

1.2.1.2 System shall demand a service offer from the new members at the time of registration to the system.

1.2.2 Service Offers

1.2.2.1 System shall allow each community member to publish their service offers and requests.

1.2.2.2 System shall give social credits to the users for services, which will be available on the profiles of the users.

1.2.2.3 System shall count offered services and used services for each member, for establishing balance within the community.

1.2.3 User Profiles

1.2.3.1 User Profiles shall include name, surname, e-mail address, published services by the user, recently used services of the user and users social credit. 


1.3 SEARCHING

1.3.1 System shall allow users to search within the published services.

1.3.2 System shall allow users to search within the services that will
be published in near future and publishing time.

1.3.3 System shall allow search with person name, service offer and location keywords.



2.NON-FUNCTIONAL REQUIREMENTS


2.1 USABILITY

2.1.1 System shall be a website.

2.1.2 Users shall connect to the Internet for accessing our system 

2.1.3 System shall have a graphical user interface
2.1.4 System shall allow multiple user access at the same time.  


2.2  EFFICIENCY

2.2.1 Web page shall be loaded at most 5 seconds.

2.2.2 The system shall be recovered from a possible database breakdown.


2.3 SECURITY AND PRIVACY

2.3.1 Personal information shall not be shared with third parties
2.3.2 User passwords shall be stored by using a cryptography algorithm. 


2.4 DEPENDABILITY 

2.4.1 The web page shall be compatible with last versions of the Chrome, Firefox and IE browsers.
 
2.4.2 The web page shall conform the W3C standards and must avoid usage of non-standard technologies.
